title: At a meeting of the heads of houses. Mar. 22. 1688. Whereas the gowns, capps, and habits of all members of this University, are by the statutes of the same to be made and fashioned with all exactness possible, ...
author: University of Oxford.
notes: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Signed at end: Ben. Cooper Register of the University of Oxon.
